name: turtles delighful for kids - free
description:
This game is made especially for children. The difficulty and its graphics are suitable for a young audience (under 8). This application is composed of two different games:

first game:
In this game, your child will be keen to show and also skillful. Targets appear and you must hit them throwing a dart. Please do not use all your darts. To win the level your child should exceed the score to beat. Playable with one or two players. When a level is successful a turtle image becomes available in the image gallery.

second game:
In this game your child needs to demonstrate speed and agility. The goal is to catch all the falling fruit by putting them in a basket. Your child should get the highest possible score to win the level. When a level is successful a turtle image becomes available in the image gallery.

Characteristics :
- Gameplay adapted to children.
- Universe suitable for children on the theme of turtles.
- Three difficulty levels.
- Simple interface suitable for children.
- 2 different games available.
- 2 possible players on one device.
- 40 pictures of turtles to be released.

the following languages ​​are available:
Albanian, English, Basque, Catalan, Croatian, Danish, Spanish, Estonian, French, Finnish, Galician, Welsh, Hungarian, Indonesian, Irish, Icelandic, Italian, Latvian, Lithuanian, Malay, Dutch, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Slovene, Slovak, Swedish, Tagalog, Czech, Turkish, Finnish, Maltese.
